addNewFeeTier(uint24).details: Will revert if the given tier is invalid, or already supported

params.feeTier: The new fee tier to add

getAllPoolsForPair(address,address).details: The pair can be provided in tokenA/tokenB or tokenB/tokenA order

returns._0: All existing pools for the given pair

isPairSupported(address,address).details: The pair can be provided in tokenA/tokenB or tokenB/tokenA order

returns._0: Whether the given pair can be supported by the oracle

prepareAllAvailablePoolsWithCardinality(.details: Will revert if there are no pools available for the pair and period combination

params.cardinality: The cardinality that will be guaranteed when quoting
params.tokenB: The other of the pair's tokens

prepareAllAvailablePoolsWithTimePeriod(a.details: Will revert if there are no pools available for the pair and period combination

params.period: The period that will be guaranteed when quoting
params.tokenB: The other of the pair's tokens

prepareSpecificFeeTiersWithCardinality(a.details: Will revert if the pair does not have a pool for a given fee tier

params.cardinality: The cardinality that will be guaranteed when quoting
params.feeTiers: The fee tiers to consider when searching for the pair's pools
params.tokenB: The other of the pair's tokens

prepareSpecificFeeTiersWithTimePeriod(ad.details: Will revert if the pair does not have a pool for a given fee tier

params.feeTiers: The fee tiers to consider when searching for the pair's pools
params.period: The period that will be guaranteed when quoting
params.tokenB: The other of the pair's tokens

params.cardinality: The cardinality that will be guaranteed when quoting

params.period: The period that will be guaranteed when quoting

quoteAllAvailablePoolsWithTimePeriod(uin.details: If some pools are not configured correctly for the given period, then they will be ignoredWill revert if there are no pools available/configured for the pair and period combination

params.baseAmount: Amount of token to be converted
params.baseToken: Address of an ERC20 token contract used as the baseAmount denomination
params.period: Number of seconds from which to calculate the TWAP
params.quoteToken: Address of an ERC20 token contract used as the quoteAmount denomination

returns._queriedPools: The pools that were queried to calculate the quote
returns._quoteAmount: Amount of quoteToken received for baseAmount of baseToken

quoteSpecificFeeTiersWithTimePeriod(uint.details: Will revert if the pair does not have a pool for one of the given fee tiers, or if one of the pools is not prepared/configured correctly for the given period

params.baseAmount: Amount of token to be converted
params.baseToken: Address of an ERC20 token contract used as the baseAmount denomination
params.feeTiers: The fee tiers to consider when calculating the quote
params.period: Number of seconds from which to calculate the TWAP
params.quoteToken: Address of an ERC20 token contract used as the quoteAmount denomination

returns._queriedPools: The pools that were queried to calculate the quote
returns._quoteAmount: Amount of quoteToken received for baseAmount of baseToken

quoteSpecificPoolsWithTimePeriod(uint128.details: Will revert if one of the pools is not prepared/configured correctly for the given period

params.baseAmount: Amount of token to be converted
params.baseToken: Address of an ERC20 token contract used as the baseAmount denomination
params.period: Number of seconds from which to calculate the TWAP
params.pools: The pools to consider when calculating the quote
params.quoteToken: Address of an ERC20 token contract used as the quoteAmount denomination

returns._quoteAmount: Amount of quoteToken received for baseAmount of baseToken

CARDINALITY_PER_MINUTE.details: This value is assigned during deployment and cannot be changed
CARDINALITY_PER_MINUTE.return: Number of observation that are needed per minute

UNISWAP_V3_FACTORY.details: This value is assigned during deployment and cannot be changed
UNISWAP_V3_FACTORY.return: The address of the Uniswap V3 factory

CARDINALITY_PER_MINUTE().notice: Returns how many observations are needed per minute in Uniswap V3 oracles, on the deployed chain

UNISWAP_V3_FACTORY().notice: Returns the address of the Uniswap V3 factory

addNewFeeTier(uint24).notice: Adds support for a new fee tier

getAllPoolsForPair(address,address).notice: Returns all existing pools for the given pair

isPairSupported(address,address).notice: Returns whether a specific pair can be supported by the oracle

prepareAllAvailablePoolsWithCardinality(.notice: Will increase observations for all existing pools for the given pair, so they start accruing information for twap calculations

prepareAllAvailablePoolsWithTimePeriod(a.notice: Will initialize all existing pools for the given pair, so that they can be queried with the given period in the future

prepareSpecificFeeTiersWithCardinality(a.notice: Will increase the pair's pools with the specified fee tiers observations, so they start accruing information for twap calculations

prepareSpecificFeeTiersWithTimePeriod(ad.notice: Will initialize the pair's pools with the specified fee tiers, so that they can be queried with the given period in the future

prepareSpecificPoolsWithCardinality(addr.notice: Will increase all given pools observations, so they start accruing information for twap calculations

prepareSpecificPoolsWithTimePeriod(addre.notice: Will initialize all given pools, so that they can be queried with the given period in the future

quoteAllAvailablePoolsWithTimePeriod(uin.notice: Returns a quote, based on the given tokens and amount, by querying all of the pair's pools

quoteSpecificFeeTiersWithTimePeriod(uint.notice: Returns a quote, based on the given tokens and amount, by querying only the specified fee tiers

quoteSpecificPoolsWithTimePeriod(uint128.notice: Returns a quote, based on the given tokens and amount, by querying only the specified pools

userdoc.notice: Oracle contract for price quoting against Uniswap V3 pools
